00038 if ($_POST['Forwarders']) {
00039     $View->Controller($Output, 'SetForwarders', $_POST['Forwarders']);
00040 }
00041 
00042 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00043 
00044 if ($View->Controller($Output, 'GetForwarders')) {
00045     $Forwarders= $Output[0];
00046     ?>
00047     <table id="nvp">

00050                 <?php echo _TITLE2('Forwarders').':' ?>
00051             </td>

00055                     <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00056                 </form>
00057             </td>
00058             <td class="none">
00059                 <?php PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX2('Forwarder is the IP address of a DNS server that the system itself queries. In simple setups, this is usually the IP address of a DSL modem which functions as gateway to the Internet.')) ?>
00060             </td>
